data.fullContent: Samina's medical school exams are coming up. She is trying to go over everything that she's learned in the past year. She is really looking forward to the summer holidays, by which point she will have finished her last exam. Between now and then, however, she needs to review all the bones, muscles, and systems of the human body.
data.answer: 萨米娜的医学院考试快到了，她想把过去一年所学的东西复习一遍。她非常盼望暑假的到来，那时她就会完成最后一门考试了。然而，从现在到那时，她需要复习所有的骨骼、肌肉和人体系统。
